title: 7 Days - Novel Updates
author: CXS
description:
The second young master of Shen Zhuang Jia, Shen Heng, during the time he was sent to take care of the stable, he encountered a flower thief falling from the sky.

The flower thief is very dedicated, very serious, and very beautiful

During seven days, what methods does he have to used to deal with the flower thief?

“It doesn’t matter, just castrate him.”—Shen Pian

“Outstanding beauty……” — Ouyang Qi

“Dragged out, chop into pieces and feed to the dogs!” —Shen Ping

*This novel is like a diary describing their meeting from Shen Heng’s perspective in the seven days*>
